result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiteann sin amaċ ċoṁ minic anois agus a ṫitfeaḋ blianta beaga ó ẛinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ga: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.orig: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.html: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ponchtml: Ní íocfaiḋ an binse as costais dlí a ṫiteann ar ḋuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
